scripts.staging:clean: git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*' && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'staging-*') || true && git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*'
scripts.staging:deploy: yarn staging:clean && TAG=`echo staging-api-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
scripts.staging:migration: yarn staging:clean && TAG=`echo staging-migration-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
scripts.preview:clean: git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*' && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'preview-*') || true && git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*'
scripts.preview:deploy: yarn preview:clean && TAG=`echo preview-api-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
scripts.preview:migration: yarn staging:clean && TAG=`echo preview-migration-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)` && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
scripts.fetch:tag: git fetch origin --prune 'refs/tags/*:refs/tags/*' && oldTag=`git tag | grep -e 'migration-v.'` && echo Last tag versions: $oldTag
scripts.product:migration: yarn fetch:tag && read -p 'Enter number new version: migration-v' version && TAG=`echo migration-v$version` && git push origin --delete $(git tag -l 'migration-v*') && git tag $TAG && git push origin $TAG
